name: Saviour Not Found
description:
Welcome to Saviour Not Found!

This is my first attempt at making a text based adventure game, and my first game as well.

Use the keyboard to make your selections.

Currently, one run can be finished in a couple of minutes, and slightly longer to explore all the possible branches of the story.

Additional chapters to the story will be added, along with better gameplay features like varied input support, music, audio cues, art etc.

Please let me know if the opening few minutes of this story have interested you, and if you appreciated my very first game.

Thank you, and have fun!
